name: Calculator 2
description:
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/823046 Original hosting website. Has a good flash emulator. This version is ahead by one update.

+ is plus

- is minus

* is times

/ is divide

Thank Ramya Senthil for making the calculator.

People use calculators in many ways. Cheat in math. Play DOOM. People use it a lot. Now you will use this everyday.

Version 1.0:

Ramya Senthil made a calculator so I used it and changed some stuff.

Version 1.1 - The End Of The World Update:

DON'T CLICK THE BUTTON.
